text: Avraham "Avi" Gabbay (,תרומות וערבויות למועמדים בבחירות מקדימות State Comptroller of Israel born 22 February 1967 in Jerusalem) is an Israeli politician. He was leader of the Israeli Labor Party between 2017 and 2019 Avi Gabbay Wins Israel's Labor Party Primary, Beating Amir Peretz Haaretz, 10 July 2017 and former leader of The Zionist Union. He was CEO of the telecommunications company Bezeq from 2007 to 2013. He was Minister of Environmental Protection between 2015 and 2016. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Government ministers of Israel Category:HaAvoda politicians Category:Hebrew University of Jerusalem alumni Category:Israeli businesspeople Category:Israeli political leaders Category:Politicians from Jerusalem
title: Avi Gabbay
